convers of a power to a seri of chebyshev polynomieven slowli converg power seri can be rearrang as seriin chebyshev polynomi if appropri sequenc transform ar us inevalu the coeffici the method is illustr by comput thecoeffici for the expans of the logarithm and dilogarithm cacmmarch 1964 thacher jr h c ca640323 jb march 101978 2 05 am 249 4 1109 254 4 1109272 4 1109 1102 4 1109 1109 4 1109 11404 1109 1188 4 1109 1306 4 1109 1464 41109 1491 4 1109 1767 4 1109 1781 4 11091787 4 1109 1949 4 1109 321 4 1109 20594 1109 2126 4 1109 435 4 1109 437 41109 463 4 1109 483 4 1109 491 4 11092732 4 1109 560 4 1109 583 4 1109 30734 1109 627 4 1109 631 4 1109 632 41109 642 4 1109 644 4 1109 653 4 1109680 4 1109 761 4 1109 762 4 1109 7634 1109 123 4 1109 140 4 1109 919 41109 989 4 1109 196 5 1109 1109 5 11091109 5 1109 1109 5 1109
